name: Unshuffle
description:
Unshuffle is a relaxing puzzle game that will challenge but not frustrate. Explore puzzle after tangled puzzle. Comfortable and immersive, Unshuffle will take you on a journey towards an ideal state of perfect mental flow. Great for both short and long sessions of play, with no in-game ads or purchases.

If you enjoy this game, consider checking out my other iOS game: 30 Second Life: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/30-second-life/id468007533
